Measure type: [123] Non preferential tariff quota under end-use
Measure components: Condition [C1] Presentation of a certificate/licence/document : Document [L] Action [27] Apply the mentioned duty : ||Condition [B2] Presentation of a certificate/licence/document : Document [N] Action [27] Apply the mentioned duty : ||Condition [Q3] Presentation of an endorsed certificate/licence : Document [Y] Action [27] Apply the mentioned duty : ||Condition [C4] Presentation of a certificate/licence/document : Action [07] Measure not applicable : ||Condition [Q5] Presentation of an endorsed certificate/licence : Action [07] Measure not applicable : ||Condition [B6] Presentation of a certificate/licence/document : Action [08] Declared subheading not allowed :
Conditions: CD152: (Conditions) Eligibility to benefit from this quota is subject to the production of an import licence in accordance with the conditions laid down in Regulation (EU) No 480/2012 (OJ L 148). | EU001: (End use) The relief from or reduction of customs duties shall be subject to the conditions laid down in the relevant provisions of the European Union with a view to customs control of the use of such goods (see Article 254 of Regulation (EU) No 952/2013 of the European Parliament and of the Council (OJ L 269, 10. 10. 2013, p. 1)).
